title: U.S. proposes final Gaza cease-fire plan, seeking agreement by next week
content: The United States, Qatar and Egypt said in a joint statement that a new cease-fire proposal was on the table, but they did not include any specifics on the deal.
summary: The United States, Qatar and Egypt said in a joint statement that a new cease-fire proposal was on the table, but they did not include any specifics on the deal.

title: Why Thailand’s new prime minister, its youngest ever, adds to old divides
content: Paetongtarn Shinawatra is just 37, but she is part of a long-running political dynasty.
summary: Paetongtarn Shinawatra is just 37, but she is part of a long-running political dynasty.

title: Viral Olympic B-girl Raygun says the ‘hate’ has been ‘devastating’
content: Australian Rachael Gunn’s breaking performance sparked a backlash, including an online petition that Olympic officials condemned as “misleading and bullying.”
summary: Australian Rachael Gunn’s breaking performance sparked a backlash, including an online petition that Olympic officials condemned as “misleading and bullying.”

title: The war in Gaza passes a bleak, bloody milestone
content: Health authorities in Gaza say the death toll in the territory has surpassed 40,000 people. Meanwhile, Israel has stepped up its de facto capture of Palestinian land in the West Bank.
summary: Health authorities in Gaza say the death toll in the territory has surpassed 40,000 people. Meanwhile, Israel has stepped up its de facto capture of Palestinian land in the West Bank.

title: London street cleaner wins dream vacation in a contest made just for him
content: A beloved street sweeper in South London wasn’t allowed to accept a holiday trip gifted by his town, so a special “contest” just for him was set up instead.
summary: A beloved street sweeper in South London wasn’t allowed to accept a holiday trip gifted by his town, so a special “contest” just for him was set up instead.

title: Amid calls for new elections in Venezuela, opposition weighs next move
content: Opposition leaders are rejecting proposals to rerun the election last month in which Edmundo González won a landslide victory over President Nicolás Maduro.
summary: Opposition leaders are rejecting proposals to rerun the election last month in which Edmundo González won a landslide victory over President Nicolás Maduro.

title: Ukraine offensive in Russia expands beyond Kursk region, soldiers say
content: Ukraine’s intelligence service announced the detention of more than 100 Russian troops, in what it said amounted to the “largest mass capture” of enemy soldiers at one time.
summary: Ukraine’s intelligence service announced the detention of more than 100 Russian troops, in what it said amounted to the “largest mass capture” of enemy soldiers at one time.

title: Gaza cease-fire talks underway in Qatar without Hamas in attendance
content: Israel and the United States, with mediating partners Egypt and Qatar, resumed high-stakes negotiations in Doha over a cease-fire and hostage-release deal.
summary: Israel and the United States, with mediating partners Egypt and Qatar, resumed high-stakes negotiations in Doha over a cease-fire and hostage-release deal.

title: More than 40,000 killed in Israel’s war in Gaza, Health Ministry says
content: The Gaza Health Ministry does not distinguish between civilians and combatants, but aid workers and experts say the 40,000 figure is probably an undercount.
summary: The Gaza Health Ministry does not distinguish between civilians and combatants, but aid workers and experts say the 40,000 figure is probably an undercount.

title: Russia sentences American woman to 12 years for donation aiding Ukraine
content: The woman, Ksenia Karelina, a beautician living in Los Angeles, was visiting family in Russia when she was arrested at the airport over a donation of about $50 to an aid group.
summary: The woman, Ksenia Karelina, a beautician living in Los Angeles, was visiting family in Russia when she was arrested at the airport over a donation of about $50 to an aid group.

title: Israel is redrawing the West Bank, cutting into a prospective Palestinian state
content: Israeli land grabs, settlement expansion and demolitions in Palestinian communities mark the most significant territorial changes in the West Bank in decades.
summary: Israeli land grabs, settlement expansion and demolitions in Palestinian communities mark the most significant territorial changes in the West Bank in decades.

title: What to know about Olympic boxer Imane Khelif’s cyberbullying complaint
content: French investigators are looking into charges including gender-based cyber harassment and public insult after the gold medalist was targeted in online attacks.
summary: French investigators are looking into charges including gender-based cyber harassment and public insult after the gold medalist was targeted in online attacks.

title: India pressed U.S. to go easy on Bangladeshi leader before her ouster, officials say
content: After Indian lobbying, Washington toned down its criticism of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina. Now both countries must confront whether they mishandled Bangladesh.
summary: After Indian lobbying, Washington toned down its criticism of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina. Now both countries must confront whether they mishandled Bangladesh.
